name: Makuza Verite
greetingText: I really like your name 😍😍 btw!
wishText: I wish you happiness everyday 😎😍 but a litte mor just for today 😁😁! ;)
textInChatBox: Yeeeee!  I remembered something! Today is your bd man 😮🙆‍♂️🧏‍♀️Happy birthday to you!!  Many many happy bro...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: What a very special this is! a very brightening one 😉😉  kbs.The day you 've started life on the earth should be as unique as this one is 🤞✌🎉. Having passed through the previous year is also a very big thing for sure :slightly_smiling_face: :smiling_face_with_3_hearts: Happy birthday again 🥳🤠. May Many blessing be upon you on this day of happiness 😄😄  and the upcoming year!  #AgewithBlessings 🙏🙏 #ageWithCash . I normally say that LIFE SHOULD NOT ONLY BE LIVED BUT ALSO CELEBRATED  so,blow a million candles🥂🐱‍🏍🐱‍🏍  Happy new year!!
replayText: click, if you want to watch it again. 😋🤣
